Author: scarletfawn
Text: It's the curse, you're eating all the restriction time's worth of food. (Well not exactly but your body is preparing for a long restriction phase like before and trying to get you to survive through it by making you crave anything you see)  This is the main reason ed people tend to yoyo with their weight, it doesn't seem enough to cut your intake by just a little when in the end it could result in more effective weight loss much quicker than restricting like crazy  ðŸ˜…
